purpose: To facilitate research and development in autonomous driving by offering a flexible simulation environment.
principle: Built on the OpenAI Gym framework, it simulates highway driving scenarios for reinforcement learning tasks.
reusability: Highly modular with support for custom scenarios and agents, integrates easily with reinforcement learning libraries.
limitations: Primarily focused on highway scenarios, may require additional customization for urban or complex environments.
name: HighwayEnv
description: A minimalist environment for decision-making in autonomous driving
highlight: Provides a modular and customizable environment for simulating autonomous driving scenarios.
